metadata.description: Brooktec's workflow orchestration plugins and agents. Install all plugins together for full workflow support.

plugins.name: shared-agents
plugins.description: Library of reusable agents for all workflows: project setup, technology detection, code review, and requirements validation

plugins.name: frontend-orchestration
plugins.description: Frontend orchestration workflow with Phase 2.5 quality gates. REQUIRES: shared-agents, frontend-mobile-development, security-compliance, and git-actions plugins.

plugins.name: backend-orchestration
plugins.description: Backend orchestration workflow with API testing, quality review, and security audit. REQUIRES: shared-agents, backend-development, test-orchestration, security-compliance, and git-actions plugins.

plugins.name: frontend-mobile-development
plugins.description: Frontend UI development and mobile application implementation across platforms (React, Angular, React Native, Flutter)

plugins.name: backend-development
plugins.description: Backend API development with Node.js, Express, and NestJS frameworks. Implements RESTful APIs, database integration, authentication, and server-side business logic.

plugins.name: security-compliance
plugins.description: Security auditing, vulnerability assessment, and compliance validation for applications

plugins.name: git-actions
plugins.description: Git operations and pull request management with Redmine integration

plugins.name: pr-review
plugins.description: Comprehensive pull request review with technology detection, code quality analysis, security auditing, and build verification. REQUIRES: shared-agents and security-compliance plugins.

plugins.name: test-orchestration
plugins.description: Automated backend test generation with execution, coverage analysis, and quality review. Supports Jest, pytest, JUnit. REQUIRES: shared-agents plugin.

plugins.name: dependency-health
plugins.description: Complete dependency health workflow: Node.js LTS validation, security vulnerability resolution with CVE tracking, safe package updates, automated linting/building/testing, and comprehensive markdown reports with Redmine integration
